heading: HR02338
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) TO IMPLEMENT REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8543 ENTITLED, "AN ACT CONVERTING THE BASILAN PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF ISABELA, PROVINCE OF BASILAN INTO A TERTIARY HOSPITAL UNDER THE FULL ADMINISTRATION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, INCREASING ITS BED CAPACITY TO ONE HUNDRED (100) BEDS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR", AND ITS CORRESPONDING IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS, DOH ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER NO. 2015-0046 DATED NOVEMBER 4, 2015
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-12-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02338
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) TO IMPLEMENT REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8543 ENTITLED, "AN ACT CONVERTING THE BASILAN PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF ISABELA, PROVINCE OF BASILAN INTO A TERTIARY HOSPITAL UNDER THE FULL ADMINISTRATION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, INCREASING ITS BED CAPACITY TO ONE HUNDRED (100) BEDS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR", AND ITS CORRESPONDING IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS, DOH ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER NO. 2015-0046 DATED NOVEMBER 4, 2015
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, SHERNEE ABUBAKAR
DATE FILED : 2018-11-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-12-04
